job_post_prompt_dialog.polaris_greeting: Hello there! I'm Polaris, your AI-powered assistant. I'm here to help you create an upstanding profile for your business.
job_post_prompt_dialog.description_instruction: Describe the profile your company is looking for, <0>Job Title/Role</0> plus any additional relevant info.
job_post_prompt_dialog.textarea_placeholder:
Ex: I am looking for an electrical engineer who is proficient in circuit design and analysis, power systems, control systems, and automation.

Or simply type: electrical engineer.
job_post_prompt_dialog.assistance_text: This will help us assist you in generating a job post that attracts good candidates.
job_post_prompt_dialog.prompt_alert_description: Please provide a prompt with at least 10 characters to generate the job post.

company_new_job_post.skills_description: Mark each skill according to whether it's essential for the role or just nice to have.
company_new_job_post.ai_suggested_description: Fields marked with the <0/> icon are pre-filled by our AI based on your job details. You can keep them as they are or edit them to better match your needs.

post_summary_step2.job_overview_description: Describe what the role is about and who you're looking for. Use the AI suggestions on the left to polish or expand your description.
post_summary_step2.job_responsibilities_description: Detail all the duties of the position. AI suggestions on the right will help you create a clear and complete list
post_summary_step2.job_requirements_description: Include the essential requirements for this position. The AI panel on the left will recommend additional requirements based on your input.
post_summary_step2.polaris_message: Here, you can review the key details of your job post! Ensure all information is accurate before proceeding. Let's create an attractive job post to find the best candidates!

job_post_summary_suggestions.requirements_description: Select the suggestions that best fit your job requirements.
job_post_summary_suggestions.responsibilities_description: Select the suggestions that best fit your job responsibilities.
job_post_summary_suggestions.description_description: Select the suggestions that best fit your job overview.
job_post_summary_suggestions.default_description: Select the option that best represents what you want to show or share.
job_post_summary_suggestions.single_selection_note: * Only one option can be selected.
job_post_summary_suggestions.ai_generation_title: <0>Let AI generate</0> the <1>{{content_type}}</1> for you <2>no need to type</2> it yourself.

screening_header.screening_questions_description: Add questions using the options below. Please ensure the questions you select are reasonably related to the job requirements.
screening_header.hide_company_description: Hide company information on this job post.
screening_header.job_post_created_description: Your new post has been created and will be published within 3 hours after our internal review.

screening_questions_types.work_authorization_question: Are you authorized to work in this country?
screening_questions_types.licenses_certifications_question: Do you have the following license or certification?
screening_questions_types.overtime_question: Are you willing and able to work overtime if needed?
screening_questions_types.commute_question: Can you reliably commute to this job's location?
screening_questions_types.relocate_question: Are you willing and able to relocate for this position if required?
screening_questions_types.custom_question_subtitle: Create your own question form the types listed below:
screening_questions_types.deal_breaker_clarification: Deal-Breaker Question: By marking this as a deal breaker question, candidates that do not answer correctly will be automatically discarded for this position.

expand_more_options.free_form_description: For this question the candidate will be able to answer the question freely on a text box.
expand_more_options.multiple_choice_description: Create as many answers to the question as you would like. Make sure to select which ones are the correct answers.
expand_more_options.file_upload_description: Candidates can only upload one file per question. Only PDF, DOC, DOCX, PNG, JPG, JPEG, GIF files are supported. Maximum file size is 10MB.
expand_more_options.date_range_description: Candidates can enter a single date. You can specify an accepted range to ensure the date provided falls within the right timeframe.
expand_more_options.number_range_description: Candidates can enter only one number. You can set an accepted range the number must fall within.
expand_more_options.yes_no_description: Yes or No are the only possible answer. Make sure to select the right one.
expand_more_options.file_question_placeholder: Enter question and describe the file you would like the candidate to upload.

validation_errors.number_range_error: Maximum value must be greater than minimum value.

expand_more_options.modal_description: You've set this as a deal-breaker question. Incorrect answers will disqualify candidates automatically.
